entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:44 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
